original_text:
Go to Kalneh and look at it;
    go from there to great Hamath,
    and then go down to Gath in Philistia.
Are they better off than your two kingdoms?
    Is their land larger than yours?
korean_text: 너희는 갈레로 건너가 보고 거기에서 큰 하맛으로 가고 또 블레셋 사람의 가드로 내려가라 너희가 이 나라들보다 나으냐 그 영토가 너희 영토보다 넓으냐

sentences.original_text: Go to Kalneh and look at it
go from there to great Hamath
and then go down to Gath in Philistia
Are they better off than your two kingdoms?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너의 두 왕국보다 더 낫습니까?

sentences.original_text: Is their land larger than yours?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 땅이 너희 땅보다 더 넓습니까?
